tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I could not be any happier with the care and support that I have received from Latha Mam and her team at Swastha Health Care.
One of the most amazing things that I noticed about her is that she is the master of her profession, yet very humble. She never imposes her opinions on her patients and always respects their choices. What's more, she always takes the time to answer any questions, even on odd hours, making herself available when it is necessary. She is always friendly and professional, making each visit feel comfortable and informative.

She is a mix of optimism and realist, motivating us while also showing them the mirror when needed. Her words of encouragement were crucial and her positivity kept me motivated in our parenthood journey.

Dr Latha is so much more than our doctor, having been instrumental in our journey towards conceiving twins. Thanks to her and her nursing staff, we were able to have a successful journey, and I cannot begin to express my gratitude for what she has done for my family.
I cannot recommend her enough to couples trying to conceive. She is an absolute treasure and an excellent physician. Anyone who has the privilege of working with her and her team will certainly be blessed. Thank you, doctor, for all that you've done and continue to do!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
First of all I would like to  lot of   thanks  Dr Latha mam  and her team  for making my dream come true  , really she is unforgettable women   in my life  like God   , Due to  some reasons my pregnancy  is very delayed, when I had delay in my pregnancy  , I got mentally depressed,  then  Dr.malathi mam refer to  consult  Dr.Latha mam swastha health care   when I consulted her,  I got feel self confident ,she is takes individual attention and care of every pateint  , Dr.Latha N an expert in treatment of infertility issues ,and  handling high risk pregnancy  and very nice  treatment and staff service as wel


Now  I am  very  happy ,that was I got delivered  to boy baby after six years from my married life

Once again  thank you very much  Dr Latha mam

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
1st I would like to thank Dr. Latha and her team for making my dream come true. Motherhood is a dream of every women.  Due to some reasons it may delayed.  Whn I had delay in my pregnancy I consulted Dr. Latha. She takes individual attention and care of each patient from consultation to scanning,  procedures...etc.. . But some time it takes time to get the result,  but we should have faith in our doctor and us . 
     Today am happy , that I got delivered to boy baby  , after 8years of my married life..
      Evn I had High B.P , and border line diabetes. 
Evn thy give any medication it was not coming down.  Bit still my doctor took utter most care , risk, attention.  Even it was Corona lockdown time,  
She took all the risks,  and delivered me. Baby was under weight,  kept in NICU,   tht time also she gave  moral support to us. 
       Today we are so happy and my son filling our life with joy and happiness.  My " DREAM COME TRUE " . 
    Once again I  would like to thank Dr. Latha and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Normal Delivery,
review: First of all would like to thank Dr Latha mam for being very supportive for the normal delivery. Even with having a little complication with regard to having a normal delivery due to high level of amniotic fluid and baby head not engaged even after completing 40 weeks, doctor was confident and very much experienced to make it a normal delivery. Very much happy with the doctor for being very dedicative and supportive. Also the doctor availability is good and  waiting time for consultation is less. Very much satisfied with the staff service as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
- Firstly, I would like to profusely thank Dr. Latha for making our dream come true of making my wife pregnant.
-After careful examination and treatment of IVF, Dr. Latha helped my wife conceive twins.
-Dr. Latha became our ray of hope to continue our efforts and made us believe that IVF is not an impossible process.
-After our consultation, treatment for 5 months, we had to move to Sweden. In spite of moving to Sweden, Doctor is so much support and extending her support by her treatment and advice. She is supporting her remotely making sure the treatment given is intact. She attends calls at any point in time and clarifies all our doubts. 
-She is so practical in her approach and makes her patient understand the treatment provided in simple terms.
-The doctor and her whole team in the clinic are very friendly and knowledgeable in her domain at the same time.

Once again A big thanks for making my wife conceive.
Best Regards - Shwetha Sunil

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cervical Cerclage,Female Infertility Treatment,Labor and Delivery,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,
review: Dr Latha N is an expert at treating infertility issues, handling high risk pregnancy and all gynic problems. Can trust her blindly and follow her instructions to have healthy baby. In My case, I was almost fed up of all treatments and was ready for adoption. Dr Latha came as a ray of hope for me and had first baby in 2016, considering all the risks and treatment with first baby, had second baby smoothly, following all precautions from Dr in 2021. Nurses works with Dr are also expertise. Both Dr. And Nurse  are available all the time for emergencies. Have got patience to answer all of our queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was very pleased and truly grateful with my experience.
Visiting Dr Latha is like dealing with trusted family member.
I am always treated with tender loving care, and it is nice to be treated well since you are the patient in need of help. Caring, smiling and laughing is good atmosphere for patients. 
Dr Latha had been busy but still took the time to make me feel like I was the only patient there. *** **** * **** **** ********* *** *********** **** before starting any trament she properly explains you why it's required and what is the importance of that treatment for you. 
Staff is very polite and professional with good behaviour. 
I am guaranteeing you taking treatment form her is like you & your baby are in safe and trustworthy hands. 
I am writing to thank excellent care received during my each and every visit to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Latha was clear with course of treatment, and would never suggest anything if not required. While many had suggested for infertility treatments like IVF pointing out the low AMH values and hurrying the process.
 Dr.Latha was sure it should be possible to even conceive naturally with some lifestyle choices and the same happened within 6 -7 months. We conceived naturally. She clearly explained the infertility workup and plan.
Thankful to doctor latha for guidance and support.

She has taken great care of my health during treatment and pregnancy. It's rare to find a doctor with such personal touches and care. She is a person with outstanding quality of medical care.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of the receptionist is way too unprofessional, she doesn't have any politeness she made us wait for 90mins to finnally see a doc and when I asked her I had booked appoinment at 5 now it's 6.15 she is like you have to wait like how all others are waiting ! with no courtesy and politeness...no value for time.

context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: I had met many fertility doctors before I met Dr.Latha..none of the doctors could help with my fertility problems..we tried to conceive for 2 years but nothing happened..I met Dr.Latha Maam and conceived through IVF in first attempt itself which was like a miracle after trying for so many years...She is like a angel to us bcoz she has given us the biggest happiness of our life..I gave birth to a beautiful baby boy who is 1 week old now..so I definitely recommend Latha Maam to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Our dream became fulfil because of Dr latha ....we went for ivf treatment.. she is not a Dr for us ...she is the god for us .... treatment, communication,explanation, staffs everybody is good ...I personally reffer this Dr to all ..thank u so much Dr latha madam and her team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I met Dr Latha in 2016 while I was trying for pregnancy. Even though she is an infertility specialist and without giving me any wrong advice she constantly monitored my ovulation period to get the pregnancy done in a natural way. She is very practical and very friendly. She gave me a new hope and new joy. I truly believe she is a lucky charm with a Magic hand. Thank you Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thanks a lot Dr for adding new life into our family. No words to explain our happiness. our happiness is reborn. Also we found that as a Doctor you were  very approachable. We were Able to contact you at any point of    time without fear & hesitation. You always boosted our confidence level which helped us to achieve our long lasting target.Once again our heartfelt thanks for all the help & support.Nagaraja Rao & Brinda Rao

Respected doctor,

I take gr8 pleasure in saying that u ve did a wonderful job and an exceptional work.
I also here by would like to state that,  probably without ur treatment I might not have seen these golden days which me, my family and all of us are really enjoying each n every moment.

Shruthikiran

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My husband and I would like to thank you for taking part in the birth of our little baby girl

Dr Latha N is a great doctor! My experience has been awesome. The services have been very nice, everyone from the welcome desk to nursing staff has been very kind and helpful.

The doctor is amazing and give a lot of confidence and have a very positive attitude, very understanding and listens to your concerns. She takes  maximum time with the patient to help them with their health issues! I will highly recommend Dr Latha N to anyone looking for a specialist.

*** ** *** ** ** * I had symptoms of preterm Labour doctor helped us to complete full term and I delivered a baby girl , Norma delivery .

Thank you soo much mam for being with us .

Later the surgery was successful though it was most complicated and multiple hour surgery.
We are very much greatful to Doctor Latha for giving my wife a new lease of Life.
